meanings.sent1: The students showed their teachableness by quickly grasping the new concepts.
meanings.sent2: Her teachableness made her a favorite among the teachers.
meanings.sent3: The robot's teachableness surprised everyone when it learned to dance.
meanings.sent4: The plant's teachableness was evident as it grew towards the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The puppy's teachableness shone through as it learned to sit on command.

meanings.definition: Willing to learn or be taught.
meanings.sent1: His teachableness was evident when he eagerly attended every class.
meanings.sent2: The child's teachableness made the teacher's job much easier.
meanings.sent3: The cat's teachableness was amusing as it tried to mimic the dog's tricks.
meanings.sent4: The athlete's teachableness was like a sponge, absorbing every coaching tip.
meanings.sent5: The team's teachableness led to their rapid improvement in skills.
